borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: <p style="">The proposed development, by reasons of its design and proximity to neighbouring dwellings, will result in unacceptable impacts upon the amenity of No. 5 Wren Gardens in relation to a loss of daylight and increased overshadowing, overbearing and sense of enclosure, contrary to:</p><p class="MsoNormal" style=""><span style="background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; line-height: 14.98px;">- National Planning Policy Framework (MHCLG, February 2019)<br>- Policies&nbsp;3.5, 7.1, 7.4, and 7.6&nbsp;&nbsp;of The London Plan (March 2016)<br>- Policies BP8 and BP11 of the Borough Wide DPD (March 2011)<br>- Policies DMD1 and DMD6 of the Draft Local Plan (Regulation 19 Consultation version, October 2020).<br>- Residential Extensions and Alterations SPD (February 2012)</span></p>
description: Construction of a first floor side extension.
